name: SocialRoleOrActivities
title: Social Role or Activities
description: Degree to which the  person is able to participate in social roles and activity.  (Business ID: Entry 115499)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Social Role or Activities .),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an degree to which the  person is able to participate in social roles and activity. .),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Social Role or Activities .),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Social Role or Activities .)

contains.display: In general, please rate how well you carry out your usual social activities and roles [PROMIS]
During the past 4 weeks, to what extent has your physical health or emotional problems interfered with your normal social activities with family, friends, neighbors or groups [Veterans RAND]
I have trouble doing all of my regular leisure activities with others [PROMIS]
I have to limit my regular family activities [PROMIS]
I have to limit the things I do for fun with others [PROMIS]
I have trouble doing all of the family activities that I want to do [PROMIS]
I have trouble doing all of my usual work (include work at home) [PROMIS]
I have trouble doing all of the work that is really important to me (include work at home) [PROMIS]
I have to limit my regular activities with friends [PROMIS]
I have trouble doing all of the activities with friends that I want to do [PROMIS]
